data.caption: Submitting Machine Readable Copy Of Financial Result I.R.O Earlier Submission BSE-5565301 And 5565305.
data.news_body:
We refer to our earlier submission pertaining to the outcome of Board Meeting held on May, 16 2023 Meeting which had commenced at 2:30 P.M. and concluded at 8:00 P.M and the Audited Financial result for the fourth quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 ( BSE- 5565301 and 5565305). In this regard we would like to submit and clarify that, at the time of conversion of the documents in a Machine-readable PDF format and merging of the same into a complete set, certain pages pertaining to the consolidated financial results were erased, due to some technical issue, although the Auditors Report on the Consolidated Financials had been uploaded.
The above omission was purely inadvertent and due to technical error.
In this connection, we request you to include the updated and complete copy of the said quick Financial results, as enclose herewith for your record. .

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: We refer to our intimation dated January 27, 2023, inter alia, informing about the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company scheduled to be held on February 06, 2023, to consider Unaudited Financial Results for the Third Quarter ended 31st December, 2022.In this connection, we wish to inform you that the Company will host an earnings call on Tuesday, February 7, 2023 at 11:30 AM (IST), to discuss the Unaudited Financial Results for the Third Quarter ended 31st December, 2022. Please find enclosed the details of the earnings call.The audio recording of the call would be available on the website of the Company in due course.We request you to bring the above to the notice of all concerned.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Third Quarter Ended 31St December, 2021
data.news_body:
Please refer to our letter Ref.:LICHFL/CS/noticebm dated January 13, 2022 regarding publishing of Unaudited Financial Results for the Third Quarter ended 31st December, 2021.
In this connection we are forwarding herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the Third Quarter ended 31st December, 2021 in the prescribed format along with Limited Review. The Unaudited Financial Results and Auditors' Report on Limited Review of Unaudited Financial Results were considered and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 27th January, 2022 as considered and recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Second Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2021
data.news_body:
Please refer to our letter Ref.:LICHFL/CS/noticebm dated October 13, 2021 regarding publishing of Unaudited Financial Results for the Second Quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021.

In this connection we are forwarding herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the Second Quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 in the prescribed format, along with the Limited Review report of Joint Statutory Auditors thereon were considered and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 21st October, 2021 as considered and recommendation by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
Disclosure in terms of Regulation 46 (2) (oa) of SEBI (LODR) regulations, 2015 pertaining to the uploading of the Audio or video recordings of post earnings calls on the website of the Company.

With respect to the captioned subject the Investor Presentation, Conference Call audio recording for Q1 FY2021-22, which transpired during a conference call convened for investors and analysts on Friday, 30th July, 2021 at 11:00 AM IST , to discuss the financial results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2021, has been uploaded on the website of the Company namely www.lichousing.com.

The respective Link for accessing the said material are as given below:
Investor Update: https://www.lichousing.com/downloads/Investor_Update_Q1_FY2022.pdf

Audio Recording: https://www.lichousing.com/concall_audio.php

We request you to kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On June 15, 2021 Meeting Commenced At 11:00 A.M. And Concluded At 3:10 P.M.
data.news_body:
1) Audited Financial Results for the Fourth Quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021.
2) Dividend Declaration for F.Y. 2020-2021
3) Offer of equity shares of the Company to the promoter namely, Life Insurance Corporation of India (LICI) through preferential allotment on private placement basis and Fixation of the date and time of Extra Ordinary General Meeting (EGM).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
We refer to our intimation dated June 4, 2021, intra alia informing about the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company Scheduled to be held on June 15, 2021 to consider the audited financial results for the quarter/year ended March 31, 2021.

In this connection, we wish to inform you that the Corporation will host an earnings call on Wednesday June 16, 2021 at 11:30 AM (IST) to discuss the financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31,2021. Please find enclosed the details of the earnings call.

The audio recording of the call would be available on the website of the Corporation in due course.
We request you to bring the above to the notice of all concerned.
